entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this evening and before morning. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
